com.esri.mo2.map.img
Interface SubLayerSnapshot

All Superinterfaces:
Cloneable
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseSubLayerSnapshot
public interface SubLayerSnapshot
extends Cloneable

Contains status information about the subLayers of an ImageServerLayer. Each ServerImage contains a SubLayerSnapshot to differentiate it from other ServerImages having the same extent and image size. Implementations of this interface are expected to override the java.lang.Object.equals method with an appropriate way of comparing equality with another SubLayerSnapshot.

See Also:
ServerImage, ImageServerLayer

isSimilar

public boolean isSimilar(SubLayerSnapshot snapshot)
Determined if the specified SubLayerSnapshot is "similar" to this one. Two Snapshots are considered similar if the constituent LayerInfo's are the same in both Snapshots. This is needed for ImageServers that can potentially change the list of Layers when zooming or panning the Map.

Parameters:
snapshot - the other SubLayerSnapshot
